  physical_appearance: \The image shows a rectangular letter. There are two punch holes at the top of the paper. \\On Admiralty List\\

metadata.title_text: Testimonial letter given to Mr Appavoo Kandiar by United Engineers Limited’s Contractor’s Engineer
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a rectangular letter. There are two punch holes at the top of the paper. ""On Admiralty List""
metadata.subject_terms_1: ""United Engineers Limited"" and ""Uniteers"" are displayed at the top of the letter. Just below the main heading letters of recommendation companies engineers
metadata.subject_terms_2: Contractors it is stated that Singapore is the ""Head Office"" while Bangkok Engineers Letters Employment references
metadata.context_1: and Rangoon are designated as ""Branches"". At the end of the letter
metadata.context_2: there is a signature from the ""Contractors' Engineer"". The letter is not addressed to anyone specific in particular
metadata.context_3: and ""To Whom It May Concern"" serves as the salutation. "
